{{e.h}}

import { Component, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent { nav =[ {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-red.png", h:"work"}, {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-green.png", h:"entertainment"}, {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-pink.png", h:"family"}, {circle:"assets/icons8-filled-circle-blue.png", h:"study"} ] selectedNavHead:string = 'work' @Output navSeletedValue }
